text: The Thief of Bagdad is a 1940 British American fantasy adventure movie directed by Alexander Korda, Zoltan Korda, Ludwig Berger, Michael Powell, Tim Whelan and starring Sabu, Conrad Veidt, John Justin, June Duprez, Rex Ingram, Miles Malleson, Hay Petrie. It was distributed by United Artists. The movie won three and was nominated for one Academy Awards in 1941. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1940s epic movies Category:1940s fantasy movies Category:1940 adventure movies Category:British fantasy movies Category:British adventure movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies directed by Alexander Korda Category:Movies directed by Michael Powell Category:Movies directed by Ludwig Berger Category:Movies directed by Zoltan Korda Category:Movies directed by William Cameron Menzies Category:Movies set in Iraq
title: The Thief of Bagdad (1940 movie)
